title: Silent Echoes
overview: 'Break on through to the Other Side.' At a party one night, skeptical Tina is hypnotized by her friends, who suggest that she open her mind to her surroundings. While in a trance, she sees ghostly visions of the previous occupants of her house and of the fate that binds them all together. Join Tina on a journey to the mystical place where angels fear to tread & debauchery runs rampant.
